ai-kv17.4:1.1_0: the faculty of pain is strayed,
ai-kv17.4:1.3_0: The faculties of becoming are impermanent, conditioned, dependently originated, liable to end, vanish, fade away, and cease.
ai-kv17.4:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.4:1.5_0: a way of body, speech, and mind are impermanent, conditioned, and perishable.
ai-kv17.4:1.7_0: And that faculty of food is impermanent, conditioned, and dependently originated, liable to end, vanish, fade away, and cease.
ai-kv17.4:2.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.4:3.2_0: And they’re impermanent, suffering, and perishable.
ai-kv17.4:3.5_0: And they’re impermanent, suffering, and perishable.
ai-kv17.4:3.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.4:4.1_0: the faculty of pain is strayed,
ai-kv17.4:4.3_0: What has been said by the Buddha for what is impermanent.
ai-kv17.4:4.6_0: And the Buddha said that suffering is what was said.
ai-kv17.4:5.4_0: The faculty of pain is to be completely understood.
ai-kv17.4:5.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.4:5.6_0: the faculty of pain doesn’t give up suffering again and again.
ai-kv17.4:5.7_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv17.4:5.8_0: for that is the faculty of pain.
ai-kv17.4:5.9_0: The account of the faculties is finished.
